clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Metabolic Surgery in T2DM Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multi-Center Study for the Evaluation of Metabolic Surgery in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes in China

brief_summary.textblock: The primary goal of this study is to assess impact of metabolic surgery on glycemic control in diabetic patients.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to assess the impact of metabolic surgery (Roux-en-Y gastric bypass [RYGB] or sleeve gastrectomy [SG]) on composite measure of glycemic control at 2 years post surgery in a Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (T2DM) cohort of subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Composite Measure of Glycemic Control - Complete Remission
primary_outcome.description: Normal measures of glucose metabolism (glycosylated hemoglobin A1c [HbA1c] < 6% [7.0 mmol/L] and fasting plasma glucose [FPG] < 100 mg/dL [5.6 mmol/L]) for 1 year in the absence of antidiabetic medications;

primary_outcome.measure: Composite Measure of Glycemic Control - Partial remission
primary_outcome.description: Hyperglycemia (HbA1c 6% - 6.4% [7.0 - 7.6 mmol/L] and FPG 100 - 125 mg/dL [5.6 mmol/L - 6.9 mmol/L]) for 1 year in the absence of anti-diabetic medications;

primary_outcome.measure: Composite Measure of Glycemic Control - Improvement
primary_outcome.description: Significant reduction in HbA1c (by > 1%) or FPG (> 25 mg/dL [1.4 mmol/L]) OR reduction in HbA1c and FPG accompanied by a decrease in antidiabetic medication requirement (by discontinuing insulin or 1 oral agent, or ½ reduction in dose) for at least 1-year duration;

primary_outcome.measure: Composite Measure of Glycemic Control - Unchanged
primary_outcome.description: The absence of remission or improvement as described earlier;

primary_outcome.measure: Composite Measure of Glycemic Control - Recurrence
primary_outcome.description: FPG or HbA1c in the diabetic range (≥ 126 mg/dL [7.0 mmol/L] and ≥ 6.5% [7.8 mmol/L], respectively) OR need for antidiabetic medication after initial complete or partial remission.

secondary_outcome.measure: Composite Measure of Glycemic Control
secondary_outcome.description: The composite measure of glycemic control will be defined as previously described in the primary outcome measure.
